alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LOUISA... NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND...GOOCHLAND...WESTERN HENRICO...NORTHWESTERN HANOVER...NORTHERN POWHATAN AND SOUTHEASTERN FLUVANNA COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cartersville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goochland around 745 PM EDT. Gum Spring around 750 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Orchid, Crozier, Rock Castle, Vontay, Maidens, Three Square, Irwin, Johnsons Springs, Fine Creek Mills, and Michaux. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover
